text: Milt Thomas is a United States author and novelist. After 21 years in the music industry, Thomas began a writing career at age 50. His biography of Hugh B. Cave, Cave of a Thousand Tales, was nominated for an International Horror Guild Award in 2004. ==References== * ==External links== *Milt Thomas Interview NAMM Oral History Library (2004) Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:21st-century American novelists Category:American male novelists Category:21st-century American biographers Category:21st-century American male writers Category:American male non-fiction writers
